title: Unit Converter – Length, Area, Volume, Speed, Mass, Temperature

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: General formula: \( \text{toValue} = \text{fromValue} \times \frac{\text{factorFrom}}{\text{factorTo}} \) Where factor is the number of base units per selected unit.
